skills.list_mods: Bluff +8, Concentration +8, Diplomacy +12, Gather Information +8, Hide +4, Intimidate +2, Listen +4, Psicraft +12, Sense Motive +10, Spot +4

feat.name: Extend Power
feat.description: You can manifest powers that last longer than normal.

feat.name: Psicrystal Containment
feat.description: Your psicrystal has advanced enough that it can hold a psionic focus that you store within it.

feat.name: Speed of Thought
feat.description: The energy of your mind energizes the alacrity of your body.

feat.name: Twin Power
feat.description: You can manifest a power simultaneously with another power just like it.

feat.name: Alertness
feat.description: You get a +2 bonus on all Listen checks and Spot checks.

ability_object.name: Darkvision
ability_object.description: Range 60; Darkvision is the extraordinary ability to see with no light source at all, out to a range specified for the creature. Darkvision is black and white only (colors cannot be discerned). It does not allow characters to see anything that they could not see otherwise-invisible objects are still invisible, and illusions are still visible as what they seem to be. Likewise, darkvision subjects a creature to gaze attacks normally. The presence of light does not spoil darkvision.

ability_object.name: Psionic
ability_object.description: Total Power Points 37; Base Power Points 25; Bonus Power Points 12

ability_object.name: Weapon and Armor Proficiency
ability_object.description: Psions are proficient with the club, dagger, heavy crossbow, light crossbow, quarterstaff, and shortspear. They are not proficient with any type of armor or shield. Armor does not, however, interfere with the manifestation of powers.

character.weapon_proficiencies: Club, Crossbow (Heavy), Crossbow (Light), Dagger, Gauntlet, Grapple, Quarterstaff, Shortspear, Spells (Ray), Spells (Touch), Unarmed Strike

spell.name: Charm, Psionic
spell.effect: As charm person except as noted in the text.

source.source: Wizards of the Coast - Revised (v.3.5) System Reference Document, PsionicPowersA-C

spell.description: As charm person except as noted in the text.

spell.name: Entangling Ectoplasm
spell.effect: You entangle target in ectoplasmic goo on a successful ranged touch attack.

source.source: Wizards of the Coast - Revised (v.3.5) System Reference Document, PsionicPowersD-F

spell.description: You entangle target in ectoplasmic goo on a successful ranged touch attack.

source.source: Wizards of the Coast - Revised (v.3.5) System Reference Document, PsionicPowersG-P

spell.name: Mindlink
spell.effect: You forge a limited mental bond with another creature.
spell.target: You and one other willing creature within range that has an Intelligence score of 3 or higher

source.source: Wizards of the Coast - Revised (v.3.5) System Reference Document, PsionicPowersG-P

spell.description: You forge a limited mental bond with another creature.

spell.name: Skate
spell.effect: Subject slides skillfully along the ground.
spell.target: You or one willing creature or one unattended object 0; see text

source.source: Wizards of the Coast - Revised (v.3.5) System Reference Document, PsionicPowersQ-W

spell.description: Subject slides skillfully along the ground.

source.source: Wizards of the Coast - Revised (v.3.5) System Reference Document, PsionicPowersA-C

spell.name: Concealing Amorpha
spell.effect: Quasi-real film distorts your features, granting you concealment.
spell.target: Quasi-real amorphous film centered on you

source.source: Wizards of the Coast - Revised (v.3.5) System Reference Document, PsionicPowersA-C

spell.description: Quasi-real film distorts your features, granting you concealment.

spell.name: Ego Whip
spell.effect: Target takes 1d4 Charisma damage, and may also be dazed for 1 round.

source.source: Wizards of the Coast - Revised (v.3.5) System Reference Document, PsionicPowersD-F

spell.description: Target takes 1d4 Charisma damage, and may also be dazed for 1 round.

spell.name: Suggestion, Psionic
spell.effect: Compels subject to follow stated course of action.

source.source: Wizards of the Coast - Revised (v.3.5) System Reference Document, PsionicPowersQ-W

spell.description: Compels subject to follow stated course of action.

spell.name: Crisis of Breath
spell.effect: You compel the subject to purge its store of air
spell.saveinfo: Will negates, Fortitude partial, see text

source.source: Wizards of the Coast - Revised (v.3.5) System Reference Document, PsionicPowersA-C

spell.description: You compel the subject to purge its store of air

spell.name: Empathic Transfer, Hostile
spell.effect: You transfer your hurt to another creature.

source.source: Wizards of the Coast - Revised (v.3.5) System Reference Document, PsionicPowersD-F

spell.description: You transfer your hurt to another creature.
